bugreport.title: How to report bugs
bugreport.description:
You can report bugs using our [GitHub issue tracker](https://github.com/YTVanced/Vanced)

**Make sure to read README and check if your bug is already reported before reporting bugs!**

fields.title: When will my bug be reviewed?
fields.content: Your feedback will be reviewed as soon as possible.

bugreport.title: Report a regular bug
bugreport.description:
Sometimes applying a modification can cause an unexpected bug.
That's where you help us with a logcat (a log of all processes on your system). This helps with identifying the issue. This requires a pc.

fields.title: On your phone
fields.content:
1. Open your settings app and go to `About Phone/Phone Info` and click your build number 7 times.
2. Now go back to the settings home page.
3. You will either have a new tab called `Developer Options` in this menu or in the system menu.
4. Open Developer Options and enable `USB-Debugging`.

fields.title: On your PC/Laptop
fields.content:
[Visit this website](https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/platform-tools) and download the files for your operating system.
2. Extract this file.
3. Open the extracted folder.
4. `Shift + Rightclick` the background of the extracted folder and select `Run command prompt / powershell here`.
5. Plug your phone into your PC, keep it open and grant USB-Debugging Permission.
6. Type `adb devices`. If your phone is shown, proceed. If not, search up `[yourBrandHere] usb drivers` and install them.
7. Type `adb logcat -c`, then `adb logcat *:W > logcat.txt`.
8. Open your Vanced, reproduce your bug and then close the command prompt.
9. Now you will have a new file `logcat.txt` in the folder. Open it, scan it quickly to remove personal info.
Press `CTRL + A` then `CTRL + C`, open https://hastebin.com/, paste it and save. Use the output link for your bug report.

bugreport.title: Report a theme bug
bugreport.description: Here's how to report theme-based bugs.\nTo report bugs, you will need [Developer Assistant](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsisle.developerassistant)

fields.title: Getting started
fields.content:
After you have downloaded `Developer Assistant`, open Vanced and reproduce/find the bug, then open the layoutviewer by holding down your home button until the app launches.
Now follow these steps:
1. Make sure the bug you're experiencing is on the screen
2. Tap on the element that you think is affected by the bug
3. Go to the `Element` and `Hierarchy` tabs and screenshot the output
4. Use that screenshot for your bug report
